summary: This is a very simple mod adding 4 new Tribunes into the Castle Dour and 4 new Captains into Palace of Kings for immersive reasons.
descriptionHtml:
Anyone ever felt it was wierd that the headquarters of the factions had no Captains stationed?
If you thought it broke a immersive wall between the reality of the Civil War and how it wanted to be portrait, then this little and very simple mod might help a bit.

I've used Heavy imperial Armor on the Tribunes and the Stormcloak Commander on the Stormcloak Captians. Any mod that alters the look of the armor will work.

The 4 Captains WILL fight you in the Civil War questline end. If not something is entirely wrong, please contact me if any issues arises.



Mod used to get the Imperial Heavy Armor reskin: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33772/?
Mod used to get the Stormcloak Captains armor reskin: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40216/?

Recommended mods to build a immersive bridge: 
New Legion Armor - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33772/?
Immersive Patrols - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33772/?


Version history:
1) added 4 new Tribunes to Castle Dour

1.1) Added 4 new Stormcloak captains to Palace of the Kings

1.2) cleaned up strange voices for the Tribunes, everything should work as expected now.
author: KrizpyBone
